title: Best skills to learn for GCC jobs in 2026: What employers are really hiring for in the Gulf, from AI to cloud, cybersecurity and more
summary_full: GCC economies are rapidly embracing digital transformation, creating a surge in demand for tech-savvy professionals. Skills in AI, data analytics, cybersecurity and cloud computing are paramount. Alongside these, strong soft skills like leadership and adaptability, coupled with a commitment to lifelong learning and understanding localisation policies, are crucial for career success in the region's evolving job market.
